#labels Phase-Deploy
== Files on the memory card (root directory) ==
For Examples have a look in the SVN repository:
http://code.google.com/p/arm-webradio/source/browse/#svn/trunk/doc/card_example

=== settings.ini ===
INI-File with settings:
{{{
[SETTINGS]
PlayMode=       Play mode (for future use)
AutoStart=      Auto start file (Station item number or path to Card file)
IR=             IR Address (0=TV1, 1=TV2, 5=VCR2, 6=VCR2)

Name=           NetBios and UPnP Name (max 15 characters)
MAC=            MAC Address
DHCP=           DHCP, if fails use below settings (0=off, 1=on)
IP=             Device IP (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)
NetMask=        Device NetMask (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)
Router=         Router IP (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)
DNS=            DNS IP (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)
NTP=            NTP IP (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)
TimeDiff=       Time difference to GMT in seconds (3600 = 1h = GMT+1)
Summer=         Summer time (0=off, 1=on)

Volume=         Default Volume (0...100 %)
BassFreq=       Bass limit frequency (20...150 Hz)
BassAmp=        Bass enhancemanent (0...15 dB)
TrebleFreq=     Treble limit freqency (1000...15000 Hz)
TrebleAmp=      Treble control (-8...7 dB)

AlarmVol=       Alarm volume
AlarmFile1=     Alarm file 1 (Station item number or path to Card file)
AlarmFile2=     Alarm file 2, if 1st file not working
AlarmFile3=     Alarm file 3, if 2nd file not working

ColorBG=        Background color: Red,Green,Blue (xxx,xxx,xxx)
ColorFG=        Foreground color: Red,Green,Blue (xxx,xxx,xxx)
ColorSel=       Selection color: Red,Green,Blue (xxx,xxx,xxx)
ColorEdge=      Edge color: Red,Green,Blue (xxx,xxx,xxx)
}}}


=== station.pls ===
PLS-File with radio streams:
{{{
[PLAYLIST]
NUMBEROFENTRIES=1
FILE1=Stream Address (proto://domain:port/filepathname)
TITLE1=Stream Name
}}}


=== share.pls ===
PLS-File with network shares:
{{{
[PLAYLIST]
NUMBEROFENTRIES=1
FILE1=Share Address (proto://user:password@domain/filepathname)
TITLE1=Share Name
}}}


=== alarm.ini ===
INI-File with alarm times:
{{{
[ALARM]
TIME1= 08:00:MoTuWeThFrSaSu
TIME2=!09:00:Tu
TIME3= 12:34:Mo
}}}
A "!" at the beginning shows that the alarm is off.

Su=Sunday, Mo=Monday, Tu=Tuesday, We=Wednesday, Th=Thursday, Fr=Friday, Sa=Saturday
